ygData.subject: Re: Sony sucks!
ygData.msgSnippet: They are safe I believe, if I do understand the merger. I am on Fenin Ro, and the server merging with it I have no toons on, at least if there is they re like
ygData.messageBody:
They are safe I believe, if I do understand the merger. I am on
Fenin Ro, and the server merging with it I have no toons on, at
least if there is they're like level 1 anyway. But, by the date they
say it is to be merged, I should be back playing by then if all goes
well....

/crossing fingers

Greg


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Flaumigevylke"
<flaumigevylke@w...> wrote:
> hope they're where you left them Greg, you know that the servers
are merging
> don't you
>
> Flaumigavylke

cer
